languages.text: "Если сенешаль Вольного Торговца долго не является на подконтрольные планеты — это добрый знак. Верно, госпожа Вьятт? Это значит, что губернатор со всем справляется, и во вмешательстве сенешаля нет нужды".

traits.locale_text: "Если сенешаль Вольного торговца долго не является на подконтрольные планеты — это добрый знак. Верно, госпожа Вьятт? Это значит, что губернатор со всем справляется, и во вмешательстве сенешаля нет нужды".

languages.text: "It is a good sign when a Rogue Trader's Seneschal does not visit a subject planet for a long time. Isn't that correct, Lady Vyatt? It means the governor is taking care of all matters and there is no need for the Seneschal to interfere."
languages.original_text: "Если сенешаль Вольного Торговца долго не является на подконтрольные планеты — это добрый знак. Верно, госпожа Вьятт? Это значит, что губернатор со всем справляется, и во вмешательстве сенешаля нет нужды".

traits.locale_text: "It is a good sign when a Rogue Trader's seneschal does not visit a subject planet for a long time. Isn't that correct, Lady Vyatt? It means the governor is taking care of all matters and there is no need for the seneschal to interfere."

"It is a good sign when a Rogue Trader's seneschal does not visit a subject planet for a long time. Isn't that correct, Lady Vyatt? It means the governor is taking care of all matters and there is no need for the seneschal to interfere."

"It is a good sign when a Rogue Trader's seneschal does not visit a subject planet for a long time. Isn't that correct, Lady Vyatt? It means the governor is taking care of all matters and there is no need for the seneschal to interfere."

"It is a good sign when a Rogue Trader's Seneschal does not visit a subject planet for a long time. Isn't that correct, Lady Vyatt? It means the governor is taking care of all matters and there is no need for the Seneschal to interfere."

languages.text: «Es buena señal que el senescal de un Comerciante Independiente no visite un planeta súbdito durante mucho tiempo, ¿no cree, Lady Vyatt? Significa que la persona a cargo del planeta está haciendo bien su trabajo y no es necesaria la intervención del senescal».
languages.original_text: "It is a good sign when a Rogue Trader's Seneschal does not visit a subject planet for a long time. Isn't that correct, Lady Vyatt? It means the governor is taking care of all matters and there is no need for the Seneschal to interfere."

traits.locale_text: «Es buena señal que el senescal de un Comerciante Independiente no visite un planeta súbdito durante mucho tiempo, ¿no cree, Lady Vyatt? Significa que la persona a cargo del planeta está haciendo bien su trabajo y no es necesaria la intervención del senescal».

languages.text: “行商浪人的总领很久未曾造访某颗行星，这是个好兆头。您不这么认为吗，维亚特女士？这意味着总督把所有的事情都打理得井井有条，总领无需插手。”
languages.original_text: "It is a good sign when a Rogue Trader's Seneschal does not visit a subject planet for a long time. Isn't that correct, Lady Vyatt? It means the governor is taking care of all matters and there is no need for the Seneschal to interfere."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人的总领很久未曾造访某颗行星，这是个好兆头。您不这么认为吗，维亚特女士？这意味着总督把所有的事情都打理得井井有条，总领无需插手。”

languages.text: 「自由開拓者の家令長が臣下の星にしばらく来ないというのはよい兆候です。そうでしょう、レディ・ビャット？総督が万事うまく進めており、家令長が介入する必要もないということですから」
languages.original_text: "It is a good sign when a Rogue Trader's Seneschal does not visit a subject planet for a long time. Isn't that correct, Lady Vyatt? It means the governor is taking care of all matters and there is no need for the Seneschal to interfere."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者の家令長が臣下の星にしばらく来ないというのはよい兆候です。そうでしょう、レディ・ビャット？総督が万事うまく進めており、家令長が介入する必要もないということですから」

languages.text: "Es ist ein gutes Zeichen, wenn der Truchsess eines Freihändlers einen Staatsplaneten lange nicht besucht. Ist es nicht so, Lady Vyatt? Das heißt, der Gouverneur kümmert sich um alle Angelegenheiten und es gibt für den Truchsess keinen Grund, einzugreifen."
languages.original_text: "It is a good sign when a Rogue Trader's Seneschal does not visit a subject planet for a long time. Isn't that correct, Lady Vyatt? It means the governor is taking care of all matters and there is no need for the Seneschal to interfere."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist ein gutes Zeichen, wenn der Truchsess eines Freihändlers einen Staatsplaneten lange nicht besucht. Ist es nicht so, Lady Vyatt? Das heißt, der Gouverneur kümmert sich um alle Angelegenheiten und es gibt für den Truchsess keinen Grund, einzugreifen."

languages.text: « Il est bon de ne pas recevoir la visite du sénéchal d'un libre-marchand pendant de longues périodes. Ne pensez-vous pas, dame Vyatt ? Cela signifie que le gouverneur, ou la gouverneure dans votre cas, s'occupe de tout et que le sénéchal n'a nullement besoin d'intervenir. »
languages.original_text: "It is a good sign when a Rogue Trader's Seneschal does not visit a subject planet for a long time. Isn't that correct, Lady Vyatt? It means the governor is taking care of all matters and there is no need for the Seneschal to interfere."

traits.locale_text: « Il est bon de ne pas recevoir la visite du sénéchal d'un libre-marchand pendant de longues périodes. Ne pensez-vous pas, dame Vyatt ? Cela signifie que le gouverneur, ou la gouverneure dans votre cas, s'occupe de tout et que le sénéchal n'a nullement besoin d'intervenir. »

languages.text: "Bir Seneşal, Hür Tacir'ine bağlı bir gezegeni uzun süre ziyaret etmemişse bu iyiye işarettir. Haksız mıyım Leydi Vyatt? Valinin bütün meselelerle ilgilendiği, Seneşal'in müdahil olmasına gerek kalmadığı anlamına gelir."
languages.original_text: "It is a good sign when a Rogue Trader's Seneschal does not visit a subject planet for a long time. Isn't that correct, Lady Vyatt? It means the governor is taking care of all matters and there is no need for the Seneschal to interfere."

traits.locale_text: "Bir Hür Tacir'e bağlı bir gezegen, kendisinin Seneşal'i tarafından uzun süre ziyaret etmemişse bu iyiye işarettir. Haksız mıyım Leydi Vyatt? Vali bütün meselelerle ilgileniyor ve Seneşal'in müdahil olmasına gerek kalmamış demektir."
